name: Laura
title: Large Drawing Board
text: The extra-large drawing board is 12.5 x 12.9in long and wide, which is perfect for children's painting. Using a magnetic pen to move the magnetic beads, children can use their imagination to draw whatever they want. It's a great way to encourage creativity and imagination in young children.
